summary: This mod adds to the game new headdress.
descriptionHtml:
[color=lightblue][b]Name:		Name:		Wings of Valkyrie[/b][/color]
Date:		2013/09/03
Version:	1.00
Author:		Anton

[heading][color=yellow]Description:[/color][/heading]
This mod adds to the game new headdress.
It represents in two variants: with special effects and without ones.
Use only one ESP at a time.

[heading][color=yellow]Demonstration video:[/color][/heading]
[youtube]Da2M3LaS45Y[/youtube]   [youtube]o01Ips3FeD4[/youtube]
[youtube]BdL2gixcP0E[/youtube]

[heading][color=yellow]How to get it:[/color][/heading]
You can create the hat in any forge if you have appropriate ingredients. (Topic: Jewelry)

[heading][color=yellow]Install:[/color][/heading]
1. Unpack mod to the game\'s \"\\Data\" folder.
2. Activate plugin in launcher \"Wings of Valkyrie (no effects).esp\"
	or
   Activate plugin in launcher \"Wings of Valkyrie (yes effects).esp\"
(mod archive is compatible with NNM and WrayBash installers)

[heading][color=yellow]Uninstall:[/color][/heading]
Remove folders:
- \"data\\meshes\\[Anton] mods\\Valkyrie Wings\"
- \"data\\textures\\[Anton] mods\\Valkyrie Wings\"
- and file \"Wings of Valkyrie (no effects).esp\" or \"Wings of Valkyrie (yes effects).esp\"

[heading][color=yellow]Uncompatibilities:[/color][/heading]
... none, yet ...

[heading][color=yellow]Credits:[/color][/heading]
Developers of Blender 2.65+
Developers of Paint.NET
NifTools team for Nifskope
Site \"render911.ru\" for free textures
Bethesda for the game and Creation Kit
AleksTirex and Artem13 for help with scripting
My tools for newest Blender :)

[heading][color=yellow]Permissions:[/color][/heading]
Don\'t change anything and don\'t upload it to another sites without my permission, please.
author: Anton
